name: A thick collar of wolven origins
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has poor armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wolven collar can sometimes protect its wearer from werecurses.
